name: Car Parking Simulator prototype
description:
A prototype parking simulator game where you have to drive a car between different levels in order to park it in the marked areas.

This is a prototype made just for fun and for testing purposes, it may become a real game in the future.

GAMEPAD NEEDED FOR PLAYING THE GAME.

*The prototype has some known bugs that I will fix in the coming days/weeks, feel free to give all the feedback and bug report that you want, will be very apreciated.
